rows.label: tlk41100126_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I can't believe Luchini
knows a bunch of skilled
Drivers like you guys!

rows.label: tlk41100126_01_msg0002
rows.name:
The only Driver I know is
just a drunk old man...

rows.label: tlk41100126_01_msg0003
rows.name:
I bet you guys pull off some
cool Blade Combos, right?

rows.label: tlk41100126_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Then you get an elemental
effect, so you can take down
enemies with an advantage.

rows.label: tlk41100126_01_msg0005
rows.name:
I'd love to see a cool Driver
and Blade fight someday...
